features.title: Easy & Quick Charts
features.info: Create professional charts instantly by selecting an Excel file. No Excel expertise required - just adjust settings and generate.

features.title: Data Privacy First
features.info: Files processed locally in your browser. No data upload needed, ensuring complete privacy and security of your sensitive information.

features.title: Multiple Chart Types
features.info: Create various chart types including bar, line, pie, scatter and combo charts to best visualize your data.

features.title: Advanced Combo Charts
features.info: Create dynamic combination charts that blend bar and line elements with dual Y-axes, ideal for visualizing multi-scale data relationships.

features.title: Custom Styling
features.info: Customize every aspect of your charts with real-time preview - from color themes and margins to grid lines and legends.

features.title: Data Analysis Tools
features.info: Flexible dimension selection and data aggregation options. Support various Excel summarize values and show value functions.

features.title: Dynamic Data Filtering

features.title: Responsive Viewing
features.info: View charts on any device with full-screen support, zoom capabilities, and interactive data tooltips perfect for presentations.
